question: Environmental Studies is the study of human activities only.
Pollution is a major concern addressed in Environmental Studies.
Deforestation leads to an increase in biodiversity.
Sustainable development aims to balance economic growth with environmental protection.
Climate change has no impact on sea levels.
Recycling helps in reducing waste and conserving natural resources.
Using solar energy is an example of sustainable development.
Cutting down forests has no effect on oxygen levels.
Air pollution is caused only by factories.
Water pollution affects marine life negatively.
